text: Song of Pig () is the first solo album from Chinese pop star Xiang Xiang. It is available on the iTunes Store and is composed of the following tracks: * "Zhu Zhi Ge" ("Song of Pig") ("猪之歌") * "Lao Shu Ai Da Mi" ("Mouse Loves Rice") ("老鼠爱大米") * "Dong Tian de Xing Yuan" ("冬天的星愿") * "Quan Shui" ("泉水") * "Wo Ai Shui Jiao ("I Love Sleep") ("我爱睡觉") * "Mao Mao" (Cat) ("毛毛") * "Yin Xiang" ("吟香") * "Xia Chong" ("Summer Insects") ("夏虫") * "Jiang Nan" ("江南") * "Lao Shu Ai Da Mi" (duet with Yang Chengang) * "Zhu Zhi Ge (Instrumental)" ("Song of Pig Instrumental") Category:2005 albums Category:Xiang Xiang (singer) albums
title: Song of Pig (album)
